mapper.sql:
FROM study WHERE true
AND title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND writer LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR writer LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into study (title, category, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{category}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select study.id , study.writer , study.title , study.content , study.category , file.id as "file.id" , file.originName as "file.originName" , file.fileName as "file.fileName" from study study left outer join study_file file on file.studyId = study.id where study.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into study_file (studyId, originName, fileName) values (#{id}, #{originName}, #{fileName})
mapper.select: select study.id , study.writer , study.title , study.content , study.category , study.view_cnt , file.id as "file.id" , file.originName as "file.originName" , file.fileName as "file.fileName" from study study left outer join study_file file on file.studyId = study.id where category = #{category} order by study.reg_date desc limit 1
